summary: Six of the world's best young magicians battle for the title of Teen World Champion.
cast: Ed Alonzo|Albert M. Belmont Jr.|Gay Blackstone|Eugene Burger|Lance Burton|Joan Caesar|Bill Cook|Joe Diamond|Bob Dorian|Kyle Eschen|Siphiwe Fangase|Eric Giliam|Andrew Goldenhersh|William Goodwin|David Gore|Hideo Hara|Hiroki Hara|Mio Hara|Neil Patrick Harris|Mark Kelly|Steve Kline|Matthew Knight|Christine Koch|Anne Lambert|Krystyn Lambert|Derek McKee|Craig Mitchell|Richard Nakata|Christina Nkonyana|Nkumbuzo Nkonyana|Sean Paranuk|Ben Proudfoot|Aaron Rabkin|Nicholas Saint-Erne|Dustin & Dylan Seamans|Sharon Seamans|Mike Segal|Joanie Spina|Scarlett Tidy|Luis Villamonte|Becki Wells|Justin Willman|The Yamagami Brothers|Diana Zimmerman
director: Director: Clay Tweel (as J. Clay Tweel)
title: Make Believe
